summary: Disasters like hurricanes and wildfires affect hundreds of American communities. Investments in disaster resilience can reduce the overall impact and costs of future disasters. We testified about federal opportunities to improve national preparedness and resilience. For example: Addressing FEMA's emergency management capability gaps could help improve capacity in key areas (like recovery and mitigation) Streamlining FEMA's lengthy and complex grant application process could help states...
title: Disaster Resilience: Opportunities to Improve National Preparedness
